description:
This course gives a small glimpse on:

  1. Goal Setting

This course covers fully Time Management .

This course helps in :

  1. Preparing Good Time Table or Workable Schedule.
  2. Maintaining Punctuality.
  3. Understanding the factors affecting Time Management.

This course also gives a small glimpse on:

  1. achieving better concentration.
This course helps you :
  1. Achieve Emotional Balance.
  2. minimize an anger.
  3. Learn different types of unpleasant emotions.

This course

Covers fully Salary Negotiation for fresh job aspirants or "freshers"
title: Salary Negotiation :For Fresh Job Entrants + Time Management
